channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump's new H-1B fee won't apply to existing visa holders, official says
item.description: A new $100,000 fee for H-1B visas goes into effect Sunday, but it will not be applied to existing holders of valid visas re-entering the country, a Wh...

item.title: Trump demands Bondi prosecute political foes in Truth Social posts
item.description: The messages came after he forced out a U.S. attorney in Virginia who declined to pursue charges against New York Attorney General Letitia James and f...

item.title: TikTok deal will be signed soon, with U.S. control of algorithm, White House says
item.description: A deal to bring TikTok's U.S. platform under American ownership is done and should be signed soon, with domestic control of the app's crown-jewel algo...

item.title: U.S. conducts fourth strike against vessel transferring drugs, Trump says
item.description: The U.S. military conducted a strike on Friday against a vessel that was allegedly transferring drugs, President Trump said. Why it matters: This was ...

item.title: Trump says prosecutor fired after gaining "UNUSUALLY STRONG" Democratic support
item.description: President Trump claimed the U.S. attorney in Virginia who didn't pursue a case against New York's attorney general Letitia James was fired following e...

item.title: Scoop: Qatar requests Israeli apology to resume Gaza mediation efforts
item.description: Qatar wants an apology from Israel for its strike in Doha before it resumes its mediation on a Gaza peace deal, according to two sources familiar with...

item.title: Trump’s changes to skilled worker visas spark confusion. Here’s what to know.
item.description: Trump announced a $100,000 fee for H-1B visas, and said entry restrictions would apply as of Sunday. That’s led to confusion among visa holders and im...

item.title: Theatrics, not vital legislation, now dominate action in Congress
item.description: Approving low-level nominations and weighing censures have commanded attention, while violence rages in Gaza, Ukraine and at home.

item.title: How benching Kimmel landed Disney’s Iger in the middle of culture wars
item.description: Industry observers say the CEO who oversaw Disney’s rise to global dominance is caught between a rock and a hard place

item.title: Luigi Mangione’s attorneys push to remove death penalty in federal case
item.description: Mangione’s lawyers say officials have acted improperly in the case and unfairly biased jurors.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
